title: Apple says iPhone 13 production in India now underway after earlier problems
content:
iPhone 13 production in India has now begun, says the company, some three months after the planned start date.

The delay was due to horrendous working conditions uncovered at the Foxconn plant in Chennai …

more…

The post Apple says iPhone 13 production in India now underway after earlier problems appeared first on 9to5Mac.
